metadata.name: Plankton #1
metadata.description:
Shezad Dawood (b.1974), Sea of Redemption, Plankton #1, 2023. Expanded NFT: ERC-721 (NFT) + redeemable as holographic collectible card. Redeem at [zien.io](https://zien.io/).   
  
More than there are stars in the sky: a billion billion billion phytoplankton dwell in the worldâ€™s oceans. Every time you accidentally swallow a teaspoon of ocean water you inhale several thousand plankton.
